EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that they need attachment for HP Big Quote
EmailTemplate.name: WRF HP Big Deal Quote
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF HP Big Deal Quote Needed: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}. We appreciate the opportunity to work with you.
In order for us to assign this request, we will need a .txt or pdf version of the HP Quote.
For new customers or those who have not participated in an HP Big Deal previously, you may contact Terry Burgos to receive the file.
For existing and renewal customers, please proceed to the HP Big Deal Sharepoint Site at the following link:
http://sp.na.odcorp.net/sites/WSS3/bsgsops/_layouts/1033/viewlsts.aspx
Once you have received the file, please reply to this email with your attachment.
Thank you,
BSD BIDS
